about_the_game:
Synopsis

A young girl wakes up from the whistling body of the sea, and is welcomed into a strange world with the illusion of sluggish falling and suffocation.

There is no memory of self, there is only something - a feeling.

A viscous pull towards the past and an indelible hatred.

Players will take on the role of a young girl with amnesia as she ventures through a bizarre and disorienting inn as a member of the Sons of the Moon Dog Circus, which revolves around the entire circus to decipher the secrets of the past and the future, and ultimately, to find the truth about themselves. In the ups and downs of the plot, the player will experience the baptism of bitter, spicy, sweet and sour, peeling off layers of fraud and thorns, to reach the other side.

Players can pluck up the courage to say goodbye to the past and bravely step into the future.

Or fall into the sweet mire of the past, and ■■ ■■ together with the sleep, until forever.

Character Information



She is the aerialist of the circus, embodies a big sister figure—dashing and reliable. Even when her head has been meddled with, she remains a trustworthy presence.



He is another aerialist in the circus and her brother, holds an open secret: he dislikes anyone speaking about his sister.



He is the circus doctor, sports an innocuous, gentle visage that belies the chilling deeds he's capable of. It's best not to cross him.



He is the newest clown, is a paradigm of a joyful puppy. Puppy get sad too, but this puppy doesn't say anything, he will do something.



She is the exotic fortune teller, is known for her sharp tongue, particularly with men, yet she's even more caring towards her sisters. Lately, she's been bothered by a tiny pink problem.



He is the magician of high repute, looks every bit the obedient boy, but who knows.



Where did this clown come from? No application was received, yet he is working for free? Hmm? What? Can't be chased away?

Featured Synopsis

This is a pixel drama-oriented game with a micro-horror puzzle game atmosphere and elements, and you can enjoy a relationship where the romance can be decided by the player.

Storyline
The girl is about to wake up from the water and she meets a completely new world. She is about to embark on an adventure in the hotel, as a member of the circus, to experience the baptism of bitterness and sweetness, peeling off layers of fraud and thorns to reach the other side. There are also 8+multiple endings, including dead ends

Artwork
10+CG and lovely pixel art provided by a team of artists to bring you a beautiful visual experience.

Puzzle
The puzzle content is of low difficulty, allowing players to experience the plot while not being too bothered by the puzzles.

Game Information

This demo version of the game takes about 20 minutes to play

Includes the first room of the prologue and two romance rooms, please enjoy. If you are interested, you can join Discord or join QQ group.

QQ group number: 339798199
